get.description: List threads for the specified app, ordered by updated_at desc.
Get a specific thread by ID.

List messages for a thread with cursor-based pagination.
Messages are ordered by seq ascending (oldest first).

parameters.name: before_seq

schema.description: Get messages before this sequence number (cursor pagination)
schema.title: Before Seq

parameters.description: Get messages before this sequence number (cursor pagination)

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of messages to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of messages to return

post.description:
Append a new user message to the thread.

This endpoint:
1. Locks the thread row (SELECT FOR UPDATE)
2. Reads and increments next_seq atomically
3. Creates the message with role="user" and the allocated seq
4. Updates thread.updated_at

This approach guarantees concurrency-safe seq allocation.

Create an assistant message (for dashboard simulation).

This allows the business owner to manually reply as the assistant
through the dashboard UI.

get.description: Get a specific message by ID.

post.description: Run the orchestrator synchronously and return JSON result.

get.description:
Run the orchestrator and stream the response as SSE.

If the partner returns SSE (text/event-stream), their stream is proxied
directly to the client. Otherwise, the orchestrator generates simulator
chunks locally.
